Bro. L-----heard the explanation my husband 
                                                                           9
made of matters and things in connection with the cause and work of God. Bro. L-----made some admissions but he did not right his wrong doing. He justified himself and left the most cruel censure upon others. He lost control of himself and was for the time insane, because he was brought to a point where he must account for the course he had pursued. This was the spirit he usually manifested when his track was crossed. He gave the lie to different ones who made statements of matters and things, and finally left for O-----.
